entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 8:00 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
